column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A surprise came after a foreign man died at 9 am on February 26
column5: in a rented room in Sangkat Steung Mean Chey 2
column9: worked at the Institute of Foreign Languages ​​(IFL).------According to a witness
column10: he went to the rentied room
column11: saw the victim lying dead and  promptly reported to the authorities.------After the incident
column12: the Office of Science and Technology of the Phnom Penh Police Commissariat visited the body and made a statement saying that the man had died of a heart attack.------The body is being kept at Wat Steung Meanchey to wait for relatives.
